::Battera::

She transformed into bot mode and looked at Zardus.  "She siad that 
she would be arriving shortly and with something for you.  She also 
said I am to take orders from you from now on."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus looks over at Battera as she lands (he was outside).
> 
> "I'm right here," he says, stepping out of the shadows of the exit. 
His 
> completely black body had hidden him from view, his red optics now 
looking at 
> Battera with curiousity, "What did Feline want to tell me?"
